attributes.action: Ban the use of Midazolam within the UK.
attributes.additional_details: For the health and safety of patients under the care of a medical professional.
attributes.background: To debate the safety of Midazolam and what it is used for.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  

The use and safety of medicines is a matter for the MHRA (https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/medicines-and-healthcare-products-regulatory-agency) and not directly decided by the UK Government or Parliament .
